useCase.name: Preview Data Package Process

preconditions.precondition: Publisher requests preview of data package.

successEndConditions.condition: Preview link is displayed to the Publisher.

useCase.trigger: Publisher requests preview of data package.

mainSequence.step: Publisher requests preview of Data Package.
UI Interface prepares Data Package for Preview.
Data Package Service validates Data Package.
Data Package Service sends validated Data Package for Preview.
Data Package Service provides Preview Link to UI Interface.
UI Interface displays Preview Link to Publisher.
